description:
With the help of Gintoki and the others, Hijikata finally breaks his curse. But when he tries to interfere with Kondo`s assassination, Ito lashes out at him. As their final battle is about to begin, Gintoki fights against the fierce Bansai Kawakami of the Kiheitai. As they cross swords, Bansai informs Gintoki that the whole fight was a set up to destroy the Shinsengumi. Could the person really pulling the strings be…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Important Things Are Hard to See
大切なものは見えにくい
